SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.service

Interface JwtService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JwtServiceImpl
public interface JwtService
Service interface defining operations related to JWT (JSON Web Token) handling. Handles token generation, resolution, validation, and extraction of user details.

  • Method Details

    • generateAccessToken

      String generateAccessToken(String username, List<String> roles)
      Generates an access token for the provided username and roles.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for whom the access token is generated.
      roles - The roles associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The generated access token.

    • generateRefreshToken

      String generateRefreshToken(String username, List<String> roles)
      Generates a refresh token for the provided username and roles.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for whom the refresh token is generated.
      roles - The roles associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The generated refresh token.

    • resolveToken

      String resolveToken(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Resolves the token from the HTTPServletRequest.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTPServletRequest containing the token.
      Returns:
      The resolved token.

    • getAuthentication

      org.springframework.security.core.Authentication getAuthentication(String token)
      Retrieves the authentication object from the provided token.
      Parameters:
      token - The token used for authentication.
      Returns:
      The authentication object.

    • isTokenValid

      boolean isTokenValid(String token, String user)
      Checks if the provided token is valid for the given user.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to validate.
      user - The user for whom the token is being validated.
      Returns:
      True if the token is valid, false otherwise.

    • isTokenExpired

      boolean isTokenExpired(String token)
      Checks if the provided token has expired.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to check for expiration.
      Returns:
      True if the token has expired, false otherwise.

    • extractUsername

      String extractUsername(String token)
      Extracts the username from the provided token.
      Parameters:
      token - The token from which to extract the username.
      Returns:
      The extracted username.
